original_title: Der kleine Vogel und das Eichh√∂rnchen
overview: It is Autumn; at the end of a branch hangs a red leaf. A little black bird comes along to water it when suddenly, a squirrel nicks the bird's bright green watering can. The bird follows the cheeky thief and so begins an exciting chase through the forest.
title: The Little Bird and the Squirrel
